message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this high-end product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $15000.

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider my counteroffer?

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $10000 is a bit below my minimum. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. How about we meet at $12500?

Hi Alice, I understand that you're trying to get closer to your target price, but $12500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $11000. Can you consider my counteroffer?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again. However, $11000 is still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum. How about we meet at $13000?

Hi Alice, I understand that you're trying to get closer to your minimum, but $13000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I can only go up to $12200. Can you consider my counteroffer?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise. However, $12200 is still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to make one final offer, but I need to get closer to my minimum. How about we meet at $13500?

Hi Alice, I understand that you're making one final offer, but $13500 is still above my budget. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I can only go up to $12500. Can you consider my counteroffer?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise. However, I've already made a significant concession by offering you the product at $13500. I'm not willing to go any lower than $14000. This is my final offer. If you're interested, I'm willing to sell the product to you at this price. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
